changeSet.author: Ian T Small
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE `google_tokens`( id INT(10) UNSIGNED NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, users_id INT(10) UNSIGNED NOT NULL, refresh_token TEXT NOT NULL, access_token TEXT NOT NULL, `create_timestamp` TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, `update_timestamp` TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, primary key (id), FOREIGN KEY (users_id) REFERENCES users(id) ) ENGINE=InnoDB CHARACTER SET=utf8 ROW_FORMAT=DYNAMIC;
